ComicInfo.Summary: The Frazetta tradition of epic dark fantasy continues as the masterpiece DARK KINGDOM roars to life from canvas to the comics page. From amid the clash of steel and decks stained red comes legendary sea raider RED MORDEN, battling his way through an ocean of horror to save the family he holds dear. For love and vengeance, he will face his greatest fears, both real and imagined as he stands alone against a kingdom of darkness. A fantasy/horror one-shot in the classic style of the FRANK FRAZETTA'S DEATH DEALER series, written by MARK KIDWELL ('68, BUMP), lavishly illustrated by comics legend TIM VIGIL (FAUST, GOTHIC NIGHTS) and colored by JAY FOTOS ('68, DEATH DEALER), DARK KINGDOM features alternate covers by TIM VIGIL and NAT JONES (DEATH DEALER, SPAWN).
ComicInfo.Title: Red Morden
